All Classes

Class Description
BadCommandException
Exception thrown in cases of invalid commands
Commander
The Commander class implements most of the features of the text editors and handles appropriately the list with the lines and various actions that are based on them.
EntryConverter
A class used for converting byte arrays to lists of WordEntry objects and the opposite
FileLine
Class for creating a Node for the list containing a line of the txt file and references to the next and previous nodes of it.
FilePageAccess
Class for writing and reading from a file using the RandomAccessFile principles It also provides methods for checking different characteristics of a file at a specific point
Indexer
Indexer class is used for indexing the file and cutting it to words.
MyEditor
MyEditor class contains the main method and features some simple procedures such as - The instantiation of a Commander object - The method for printing a simple console logo - Passing the arguments of the user to the program - Initiating the method for accepting commands.
StandardReader  
TerminateException
Exception thrown to terminate the program
WordEntry
Class for storing a word and the line in which it was found
